Evaluation of antibacterial activity. Antibacterial activity of the EOs was investigated against four important food-borne bacteria including E. coli (PTCC 1533), L. monocytogenes (PTCC 1298), S. aureus (PTCC 1015) and S. typhimurium (PTCC 1730). The bacterial strains were obtained from a microbial collection of Department of Food Hygiene and Quality Control, Faculty of Veterinary Medicine, Urmia University, Urmia, Iran. Bacterial suspensions were prepared to culture the lyophilized bacteria in 9 mL of Brain heart infusion (BHI) broth (Sigma-Aldrich, St. Louis , USA) and incubated at 37 ËšC for 24 hr.
